meanings.definition: A large metal disk that produces a loud ringing sound when struck.
meanings.sent1: The gongs in the orchestra created a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent2: The temple had a set of gongs used during ceremonies.
meanings.sent3: When the gongs started ringing, the monkeys in the forest got startled.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like the sound of gongs.
meanings.sent5: The gongs reverberated through the valley, signaling the start of the festival.

meanings.definition: To make a loud ringing sound, like that of a gong.
meanings.sent1: The clock gongs signaled the end of the school day.
meanings.sent2: The old grandfather clock gongs every hour.
meanings.sent3: As the chef dropped the pan, it gongs loudly in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The church bell gongs could be heard across the village.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock gongs woke him up abruptly every morning.
